item.description:
http://www.trimbleoutdoors.com/ViewTrip/1049771 This website gives an idea of our hike.

Backpack - Moderate hike

We will begin by carspotting at Rhododendron State Park (9am) and then meet up with the Mt Grace group around 9:30am. 

We will start our backpack by hiking over Mount Grace along the METACOMET-MONADNOCK TRAIL.  In approximately, 9 moderate miles we make camp at a shelter near Royalston Falls where we will set up camp for the night and have dinner.  The following morning after breakfast we will continue on the trail to Little Monadnock at the State Park. (approximately 9 miles) 

My backpacking gear list:
backpack
tent
sleeping bag
pillow?
thermarest pad
platypus
utensils
bowl
Aquamira/iodine tabs/water fliter
first aide kit
sturdy boots/Tevas  (so you can take those boots off at the camp site)
gaiters
gortex jacket
gortex rain pants
hat/gloves
hiking socks
fleece top
head lamp
purell
pack towel
toilet paper
baby wipes
bug spray
kleenx
toothbrush/paste
food and water
item.how_to_find_us: We will be carspotting at both sites

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: BACKPACKING - Mt Grace to Little Monadnock -MODERATE
